resource.doc: Retrieves the allocated Offers for Offer program for a specific user.

param.name: program
param.doc: Identifies the desired UI program. Possible values are given below

param.name: hierarchies
param.doc: If hierarchies=y, then hierarchy payload that is returned in Hierarchy Service will also be returned along with this Service. But if this query parameter is omitted or if its passed as hierarchies=n, then hierarchy payload won’t be returned.

param.name: storeId
param.doc: This specifies the store id for which offers will be retrived for. If store id is null or not specified it will default to the user primary store id.

param.name: topAllocations
param.doc: Applicable only for YCS. If topAllocations=y, then top allocations by frequency and savings will also be returned. In addition to this, frequencyRank and savingsRank of each allocated offer will be returned

param.name: topAllocationsCount
param.doc: Applicable only for YCS and topAllocations=y. This determines the number of offers that should be returned as part of frequency and savings top allocations. All allocated offers will have frequency and savings rank irrespective of topAllocationsCount. If this parameter is not passed, the default value will be taken as 10.

param.name: hiddenCategories
param.doc: Applicable only for YCS and topAllocations=y. Coma separated hidden category ids used to filter out hidden category items in frequencyTopAllocations and savingsTopAllocations . If this parameter is not provided, this filtration will not be done.

param.name: inclTypeCnt
param.doc: Supported for PD, CC, SC & MF services in preview mode to include offerTypes count hierarchy that’s used for CD display.

param.name: eventId
param.doc: Mandatory if view is ‘campaign’. Identifies the desired event for the campaign.

resource.doc: Retrieves top 10 allocations and currently supported only for YCS.

param.name: program
param.doc: Identifies the desired UI program. Possible values are given below

param.name: storeId
param.doc: Prefered Store Id. Should be a valid numeric value. Will be defaulted to primary store if not provided

param.name: hiddenCategories
param.doc: Coma separated hidden category ids. If this parameter is not provided, hidden category filtration will not be done.
